title: Determine Frequency Same or Not
text: Determine if the frequency of the two waves is the same.

title: Superimpose the Waves
text: Superimpose the waves by drawing them on the same plane.\n##figure3.gif##

title: Determine In Phase Or Out Of Phase
text: The addition of in phase waves leads to constructive interference where the amplitude of the resultant waves is equal to the sum of amplitude of the two original waves. On the other hand, The addition of out of phase waves leads to destructive interference where the amplitude of the resultant waves is equal to the difference between the amplitude of two original waves.

title: Sketch the Result
text: Sketch the resulting wave by adding the amplitude of the two waves.\n##figure4.gif##
